title: Not smart

title: This is Not Green Solution
text: Don‚Äôt kid yourself that you are doing anything positive for the planet by using this app.  It is mostly companies trying to find another way to market their products.  Most of the time the stores are making up a new order for you, rather than avoiding throwing away food.  Unless you can walk/bike to the location, you will pollute more CO2 from your car making the trip.

title: Please bring back ‚ÄúSold out‚Äù details
text: I enjoy the app and have gotten some great goodies out of it, that might otherwise have gone to waste. However I noticed in the update we can no longer see what time a store sold out of its bags that day. It was actually super helpful to know that timing, as it helped me plan for placing future orders. Developers, please bring the ‚ÄúSold out at ____time‚Äù back!
